systemComponent

Class ComponentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • systemComponent.ComponentBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodeComponentBuilder, MethodComponentBuilder, StringComponentBuilder

    public class ComponentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    father class for Builders, which contains general-use binary code operations for the components construction.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String tempString
      this field temporarily stores the string result of the public functions in this class
      long tempValue
      this field temporarily stores the value result of the public functions in this class

      ComponentBuilder(java.nio.MappedByteBuffer mbb)
      A construction method that let Components find the DEX file in memory

      • getUleb

        public void getUleb(long stringAddress,
           long firstByte)
        'uleb' coding identification
        Parameters:
        stringAddress - The offset of the string coded by 'uleb' coding.
        firstByte - The content of the first byte

      • readBinary

        public void readBinary(long mapOffset,
              long stringLength,
              java.lang.String returnValueType)
        read the binary code with certain length and certain offset. The result will be stored in member variables: 'tempValue' or 'tempString'
        Parameters:
        mapOffset - offset of a binary code
        stringLength - length of a binary code
        returnValueType - the string indicates that the return of this function is an "ADDRESS", "ASCII" or "VALUE"
